title: Lian Wharton
text:
Lian James Wharton (born 21 February 1977) is a former English <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er who played for <a href="Derbyshire%20County%20Cricket%20Club">Derbyshire</a> between 2000 and 2003.
Wharton was born in <a href="Holbrook%2C%20Derbyshire">Holbrook, Derbyshire</a>. He appeared for three years as the leading spinner within the Derbyshire line-up, and has since taken his cricketing career into the realms of indoor cricket. He was a left-handed batsman and a left-arm slow bowler. Wharton holds match-best figures of 6-62.
